items.content_html: a simple To-Do List application built with HTML, CSS, Javascript and Node.js using the Fastify framework. It provides a lightweight API that allows users to add, update, and delete tasks, as well as set the status of each task to either "Pending" or "Completed."
items.title: PedroHenriquee777/To-do-List:  a simple To-Do List application built with HTML, CSS, Javascript and Node.js using the Fastify framework. It provides a lightweight API that allows users to add, update, and delete tasks, as well as set the status of each task to either "Pending" or "Completed."

items.content_html: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.
items.title: kenjiakira/Vue-Tiktok: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.
